articles.title: Hisense Tornado 4K TV Series With Six 102W JBL Speakers Announced in India - Gadgets 360
articles.description: Hisense has announced Hisense Tornado 4K TVs. The 55-inch variant will be available for purchase in India from December 24, 2020, while the 65-inch variant will be launched in in the first quarter of 2021. The TVs come with by six 102W JBL speakers.
articles.content: Hisense Tornado 4K TVs have been announced in 55-inch and 65-inch screen sizes in India, powered by six 102W JBL speakers and Dolby Atmos. The TVs in this series run on Android TV 9 and have features… [+1705 chars]

articles.title: Realme Watch S Pro, Watch S, Buds Air Pro Master Edition to Launch in India on December 23 - Gadgets 360
articles.description: Realme is set to launch two new products in India, the Buds Air Pro Master Edition and Watch S Pro, on December 23. The earphones seem to be a premium version of the Buds Air Pro, while the Watch S series sport round AMOLED screens.
